New Records: Suryakumar Yadav scored 112 runs off 51 balls, the highest score in the series
Key Match Events: Dasun Shanaka c Patel b Arshdeep Singh 23 (17b 0x4 2x6 31m)
Dhananjaya de Silva c Shubman Gill b Chahal 22 (14b 2x4 1x6 157.14)
Suryakumar Yadav scored 112 runs off 51 balls, the highest score in the series
Post-Match Reflections: Suryakumar Yadav was awarded the Player of the Match and the CRICINFO's MVP for his outstanding performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Saurashtra Cricket Association Stadium, Rajkot
The toss was won by India, who elected to bat first
Others: The match was part of the Sri Lanka tour of India in 2022-23
